TestCase.Name: UserCanWritePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the user has permission to perform Write operation.

TestCase.Name: UserCanNotWriteRelativePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the user is denied permission to call PutRelativeFile.

TestCase.Name: NotReadOnlyPrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if file can be changed by the user.

TestCase.Name: UserCanWriteRelativePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the user has permission to call PutRelativeFile.

TestCase.Name: LocksPrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host declares support for Lock/Unlock/RefreshLock/UnlockAndRefreshLock operations.

TestCase.Name: FileEditingPrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if host declares support for PutFile/PutRelativeFile operations.

TestCase.Name: BusinessFlowPrereq
TestCase.Description: The prereq BusinessFlowPrereq must pass prior to running the feature validations related to business flows.

TestCase.Name: FileUrlUsagePrereq
TestCase.Description: The host uses FileUrl for direct file access.

TestCase.Name: SupportedShareUrlTypesForFilePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host sets SupportedShareUrlTypes in CheckFileInfo to any value.

TestCase.Name: RenameFilePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if host declares support for RenameFile operation.

TestCase.Name: SupportsScenarioLinksPrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host declares support for GetRestrictedLink/RevokeRestrictedLink

TestCase.Name: SupportsSecureStorePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host declares support for ReadSecureStore

TestCase.Name: SupportsFoldersPrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host declares support for EnumerateChildren and DeleteFile

TestCase.Name: ShareUrlTypeReadOnlyForFilePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host declares support for the "ReadOnly" Share Url type for the file.

TestCase.Name: ShareUrlTypeReadWriteForFilePrereq
TestCase.Description: Prereq WOPI Validation test to check if the host declares support for the "ReadWrite" Share Url type for the file.

TestCase.Name: FullCheckFileInfoSchema
TestCase.Description: This tests that hosts' CheckFileInfo responses conform to the JSON schema.

TestCase.Name: CheckFileWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: This tests that host returns 401 or 404 response for a CheckFileInfo request with invalid access token.

TestCase.Name: VersionInCheckFileInfoResponseChangedAfterFileContentChanged
TestCase.Description: This tests that file version is changed when the file content changes.

TestCase.Name: GetFile
TestCase.Description: This tests that get a file successfully.

TestCase.Name: GetFileWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: This tests that host returns 401 or 404 response for a GetFile request with invalid access token.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.SuggestedExtension
TestCase.Description: Tests the basic PutRelativeFile scenario where a suggested extension is specified.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.SuggestedName
TestCase.Description: Tests the basic PutRelativeFile scenario where a suggested name is specified.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.SuggestedNameConflict
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a suggested name is specified but a file with the target name already exists. Expects the request to succeed with the host choosing a suitable name.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeName
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a Relative name is specified. Expects the created file to have the exact name specified.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeNameOverwriteTrueNoEffect
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a Relative name is specified and OverwriteRelative is set to true. Since no file with target name exists in this scenario, the header should have no effect.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeNameOverwriteFalseNoEffect
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a Relative name is specified and OverwriteRelative is set to false. Since no file with target name exists in this scenario, the header should have no effect.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeNameConflictNoOverwrite
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a Relative name is specified and OverwriteRelative is not specified. Since a file with target name exists in this scenario, this should return a 409.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeNameConflictOverwriteFalse
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a Relative name is specified and OverwriteRelative is set to false. Since a file with target name exists in this scenario, this should return a 409.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeNameConflictOverwriteTrue
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a Relative name is specified and OverwriteRelative is set to true.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.RelativeNameConflictOverwriteTrueLocked
TestCase.Description: Tests the PutRelativeFile scenario where a relative name is specified along with OverwriteRelative set to true, but a file with the same target name already exists and is locked.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFile.FileNameReturnedIsCorrectlyEncoded
TestCase.Description: Tests that file name is encoded correctly after a PutRelativeFile operation.

TestCase.Name: PutUnlockFile
TestCase.Description: This tests that put a file successfully.

TestCase.Name: PutFileAfterLock
TestCase.Description: This tests that put a file with matching lock value successfully after lock.

TestCase.Name: PutFileAfterUnlockAndRelock
TestCase.Description: This tests that put a file with matching lock value successfully after unlock and relock.

TestCase.Name: PutFileWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: This tests that host returns 401 or 404 response for a PutFile request with invalid access token.

TestCase.Name: LockMismatchOnPutFileRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that lock mismatch when PutFile with incorrect lock id.

TestCase.Name: SuccessfulLockSequence
TestCase.Description: Simulates a successful sequence of lock-related requests: Lock, RefreshLock, UnlockAndRelock, Unlock.

TestCase.Name: LockMismatchOnLockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that lock mismatch when trying to refresh the lock with incorrect lock id.

TestCase.Name: LockMismatchOnUnlockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that lock mismatch when trying to unlock with incorrect lock id.

TestCase.Name: LockMismatchOnRefreshLockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that lock mismatch when trying to refresh lock with incorrect lock id.

TestCase.Name: LockMismatchOnUnlockAndRelockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that lock mismatch when trying to unlock and relock with incorrect lock id.

TestCase.Name: LockMismatchAfterUnlockAndRelockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that lock mismatch when unlock with old lock.

TestCase.Name: LockFileWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: This tests that host returns 401 or 404 response for locks requests with invalid access token.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIncludedWhenLockMismatchOnLockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is returned when lock mismatch for Lock request.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIncludedWhenLockMismatchOnUnlockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is included when responding with the 409 status code for Unlock request if no lock exists on the file.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIncludedWhenLockMismatchOnRefreshLockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is included when responding with the 409 status code for RefreshLock request if no lock exists on the file.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIncludedWhenLockMismatchOnUnlockAndRelockRequest
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is included when responding with the 409 status code for UnlockAndRelock request if no lock exists on the file.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIsNotReturnedWhenLockSuccess
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is not returned when lock success.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIsNotReturnedWhenUnlockSuccess
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is not returned when Unlock success.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIsNotReturnedWhenRefreshLockSuccess
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is not returned when RefreshLock success.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-LockHeaderIsNotReturnedWhenUnlockAndRelockSuccess
TestCase.Description: This tests that X-WOPI-Lock header is not returned when UnlockAndRelock succeess.

TestCase.Name: CheckUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests CheckFileInfo operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: GetUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests GetFile operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: DeleteUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests DeleteFile operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: PutRelativeFileBasedOnUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests PutRelativeFile operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: LockUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests Lock operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: UnlockUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests Unlock operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: RefreshLockUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests RefreshLock operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: UnlockAndRelockUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests UnlockAndRelock operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: PutUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests that host returns status code 404 when update unknown file.

TestCase.Name: RenameSucceeds
TestCase.Description: Tests that rename a file successfully.

TestCase.Name: FileNameAfterRenameIsCorrectlyEncoded
TestCase.Description: Tests that file name is encoded correctly after rename file.

TestCase.Name: RenameUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests that host returns 404 status code for unknown file.

TestCase.Name: RenameFileWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: Tests that host returns 401 or 403 status code for RenameFile request with invalid access token.

TestCase.Name: RenameToExistingNameShouldReturn200Or400
TestCase.Description: Tests that rename file should succeed or failed with status code 400 if rename to an existing file name.

TestCase.Name: GetRestrictedLink
TestCase.Description: Tests the GetRestrictedLink operation for a file

TestCase.Name: GetRestrictedLinkWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: Simulates a GetRestrictedLink request with invalid access token and expects a 404 response.

TestCase.Name: GetRestrictedLinkOfADeletedFileShouldReturnA404
TestCase.Description: Tests that GetRestrictedLink operation should fail with a 404 status code for a deleted file.

TestCase.Name: RevokeRestrictedLink
TestCase.Description: Tests the RevokeRestrictedLink operation for a file

TestCase.Name: RevokeRestrictedLinkWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: Tests that a RevokeRestrictedLink request with invalid access token expects a 404 response.

TestCase.Name: RevokeRestrictedLinkOfADeletedFileShouldReturnA404
TestCase.Description: Tests that RevokeRestrictedLink operation should fail with a 404 status code for a deleted file.

TestCase.Name: ReadSecureStore
TestCase.Description: Tests the ReadSecureStore operation for a file

TestCase.Name: ReadSecureStoreWithInvalidAccessToken
TestCase.Description: Tests that ReadSecureStore request with invalid access token expects a 401 or 404 response.

TestCase.Name: ReadSecureStoreBaseOnUnknownFile
TestCase.Description: Tests ReadSecureStore operation returns 404 status code if file is unknown.

TestCase.Name: X-WOPI-PerfTraceHeaderReturnedWhenX-WOPI-PerfTraceRequestedIsTrue
TestCase.Description: Tests host returns a value for X-WOPI-PerfTrace if the header X-WOPI-PerfTraceRequested in the request is present and equal to "true".
